posts.title: Bottle Cutter
posts.content: Easily turn any glass bottle into a small drinking cup using this bottle cutter.  It’s designed to cut bottles anywhere from 43-102 millimeters and provides a secure hold that won’t slip as you’re slicing through the glass.

posts.title: Professional Smartphone Camera Lens
posts.content: Instantly turn your smartphone into the professional quality camera you’ve always wanted using this specialized camera lens. The lens easily attaches to your phone and features up to 1/16,000 second shutter speed at 10 frames per second.

posts.title: Cannabis Cook Book
posts.content: Elevate your culinary talents to new heights with this cannabis cookbook. This groovy read features over 200 pages jam packed with delicious recipes specially developed by world renowned chefs to downplay the cannabis taste without affecting potency.

posts.title: Nuclear Element Soap Bars
posts.content: Get serious about your war with bacteria by using the nuclear element soap bars. Whether you decide on uranium or plutonium, each element soap bar features a refreshing smell and totally normal nuclear glow that lets you know it’s really working.

posts.title: Ninja Warrior Obstacle Course For Kids
posts.content: Make your energetic little warrior feel like they’re competing just like the athletes they see on TV by setting up this Ninja Warrior obstacle course for kids. The kit includes a 50′ long nylon line that boasts a series of obstacles like gymnastics rings and a spinning wheel.

posts.title: Snot Mittens
posts.content: Keep a days-worth of germs and other body fluids at hand by putting on these comfy snot mittens. The gloves are made with a soft and ultra-absorbent material that is designed to absorb 28x its weight in snot, tears, and sweat.

posts.title: Super Hearing Aid Amplifier
posts.content: This isn’t your Grandpa’s hearing aid – this super ear amplifier kit boosts audio by 5000%! Listen in to corporate meetings to gather inside information, or pioneer a new form of suicide by wearing it at a concert. The applications for the super hearing aid are endless!

posts.title: SmartThings Real Time Tracking Device
posts.content: Find important items anytime and from anywhere with help from the SmartThings real time tracking device. Using the accompanying app you’ll easily be able to track this pint-sized device as long as it’s within range of a cellular network.

posts.title: Azio Luxury Retro Keyboard
posts.content: Add some old school charm to your modern setup with the gorgeous Azio luxury retro keyboard. This typewriter inspired mechanical keyboard comes with a distinguished metal alloy border, backlit keys, and genuine leather accents for added style.

posts.title: Magnetic Floating DeLorean Time Machine
posts.content: Become the envy of all your sci-fi crazed pals by placing this 1/20 magnetic floating DeLorean time machine on display. Doc Brown’s iconic time travelling DeLorean is meticulously recreated with high attention to detail that includes 10 light-up features for maximum authenticity.

posts.title: Rainbow Fire Packets
posts.content: Astound nearby campers as you make your campfire roar to life with the rainbow fire packets. Once sprinkled into the fire, the flames will begin to glow incredibly bright and magically change colors right before your eyes – without the use of mind altering drugs!

posts.title: Soft Cat Claws
posts.content: Protect your home furniture against your cat’s destructive nature without the need to inhumanely de-claw her with these soft cat claw covers. These non-surgical caps fit over your cat’s sharp nails – preventing her from attacking any guests or tearing up the couch.
